member.name: T:SystemInfo.Diagnostics
member.summary: This class contains diagnostics associated with this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Diagnostics.RunningProcesses
member.summary: Gets the amount of processes with the 'running' state on this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Diagnostics.Processes
member.summary: Gets the processes on this system

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Diagnostics.MostMemoryIntensive
member.summary: Gets the most memory-intensive process on this computer

member.name: M:SystemInfo.Diagnostics.CommandLine(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Gets the commandline-arguments associated with a process
member.param: The process you want to check the commandline-arguments associated with
member.returns: A string which represents the commandline-arguments associated with process P

member.name: M:SystemInfo.Diagnostics.CPUUsage(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Gets the CPUUsage of a process
member.param: The process you want to check the CPU usage for
member.returns: A double which represents in %, the CPU usage associated with process P

member.name: M:SystemInfo.Management.CMDCOMMAND(System.String)
member.summary: Runs a CMD command and reads from echo
member.param: The command you want to run
member.returns: A string array containing each line of the result

member.name: T:SystemInfo.Specifications
member.summary: This class contains specifications associated with this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.ProcessorModel
member.summary: Gets the processor-model of this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.ProcessorCores
member.summary: Gets the amount of cores in this computer's processor

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.ProcessorArchitecture
member.summary: Gets the processor architecture of this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.ProcessorMaxClockFrequency
member.summary: Gets the max clock frequency of this computer's processor in megaherz

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.L1CacheSize
member.summary: Gets the L1 cache size of this computer's processor

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.L2CacheSize
member.summary: Gets the L2 cache size of this computer's processor

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.L3CacheSize
member.summary: Gets the L3 cache size of this computer's processor

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.TotalMemorySize
member.summary: Gets the total visible memory of this computer in bytes

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.GPUModel
member.summary: Gets the GPU Model of this computer

member.name: P:SystemInfo.Specifications.GPUVRAM
member.summary: Gets the amount of dedicated vram of this computer's GPU in bytes
